name: Lime
description:
I always felt the colors in a special way. For a long time I was attracted to the fluorescent palette. At first I liked how it contrasts with black, or very dark shades of blue, brown. However, now I choose a lighter, brighter palette, when the work begins to breathe, it carries a completely different energy.

Artwork created by Maksym Denysenko in 2020, 80x80 cm, Spray paint on canvas, 2883x2885 pix

The first collector of this NFT will receive this original painting. 1st collector, please DM me via Twitter @Maks_Denysenko
